alert.note: Alert for Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 4:41PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wakulla, southeastern Liberty and southwestern Leon Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 440 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles west of Crawfordville, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... East Camp, Jewel Fire Tower, Vilas, Central City, Sanborn, Owens Bridge, Poplar Camp, Smith Creek, Kern, Wilma, Nixon Garden, Twin Pole and Jensen Place. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
